about_the_game:
Developed by Alabeo, this rendition of the Cessna® C188 AgTruck, is both beautifully detailed and faithfully replicated. The team at Alabeo designed and developed this aircraft using feedback from real world agricultural pilots, which resulted in an aircraft add-on which would meet specialist needs in sim. The aluminium airframe is based on the C180, with the same 230hp engine being used to power the aircraft. The C188 proved to be an extremely popular aircraft, with around 3,976 being built.

Features:


  • Six high-definition liveries.
  • Professional flight dynamics.
  • High quality 3D model, textures and sounds.
  • Realistic material reflections.
  • Chemical fumigation liquid effect.
  • Chemical loader interface.
  • Dynamic weight effect on aircraft - real weight reduction as you drop chemical liquid.
  • Custom sound set.
  • Blank textures for creating your own designs.

The aluminium airframe is based on the C180, with the same 230hp engine being used to power the aircraft. The C188 proved to be an extremely popular aircraft, with around 3,976 being built.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.
